mapper.select: SELECT e.exam_id, e.name, u.realname as creator, e.total_question, e.total_score, e.pass_score, e.question_num, e.limit_time, e.createdate, e.start_time as start_time, c.name as course FROM zyyj_exam as e, zyyj_user as u, zyyj_exam_record as r, zyyj_course as c, zyyj_course_exam as ce WHERE e.exam_id=r.exam_id and u.user_id=r.user_id and ce.exam_id=e.exam_id and c.course_id=ce.course_id;
